DOC.HEADLINE: COLLISION OF BUS AND TRUCK IN RUSSIA KILLS 9 , INJURES 7
DOC.TEXT: A bus carrying mushroom pickers collided head-on with a truck on the Moscow-St.Petersburg highway , killing nine people and injuring seven , the Itar-Tass news_agency reported Sunday . The accident took_place Saturday in the Valdai district , about 220 miles northwest of Moscow , the report said . The cause of the accident was under investigation .
